attributes.action: Introduce Device Referenda Democracy- All decisions can now be TRULY democratic.
attributes.additional_details:
Society will not rebel, if they are in control of the UK’s direction.

Government overseas spending will have to be sanctioned by the people.

Priority of tax spend will be decided by the people, to the people’s greatest benefit.

Dispersed power is the nature of a true democracy.  To obstruct Device Referenda Democracy(DRD) is undemocratic.

Corrupt lobbying would be ended which would diminish greedy actors.

Device users can also be the conduit for non device users to cast referenda votes.
attributes.background:
As we trust our devices to make large bank transfers, we can obviously trust them in voting.

True Democracy is now an easy task, if desired.

Create an app (not requiring a digital ID), which allows secure voting on every substantial decision government makes.

People should have ownership.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you mean by "every substantial decision government makes." You could start a new petition clearly explaining what types of Government decision you would like to be subject to a digital referendum.
